events.title: Example Event: Community Vigil
events.description: This is a placeholder example of what a community vigil event might look like. When real events are scheduled, they will replace these examples. Events could include memorial gatherings, community support meetings, or remembrance ceremonies.

events.title: Example Event: Court Proceeding
events.description: This is a placeholder example of what a court proceeding event might look like. When real court dates are scheduled, they will be posted here with specific details about location, time, and how supporters can attend.

events.title: Example Event: Advocacy Town Hall
events.description: This is a placeholder example of what an advocacy or town hall event might look like. Real events could include community discussions about criminal justice reform, victim's rights education, or meetings with legislators.

events.title: Example Event: Legislative Hearing
events.description: This is a placeholder example of what a legislative hearing event might look like. Real events would include details about specific bills, testimony opportunities, and how to participate in the legislative process.

events.title: Example Event: Fundraising Activity
events.description: This is a placeholder example of what a fundraising event might look like. Real events could include community gatherings, charity walks, or other activities to support advocacy efforts and legal expenses.

events.title: Example Event: Memorial Walk
events.description: This is a placeholder example of what a memorial walk or run event might look like. Real events would include registration details, route information, and how proceeds support advocacy efforts.

events.title: Example Event: Support Workshop
events.description: This is a placeholder example of what an educational workshop might look like. Real events could include sessions about victim's rights, navigating the legal system, or accessing support resources.

events.title: Example Event: Legal Proceeding
events.description: This is a placeholder example of what a legal proceeding event listing might look like. Real court dates will be posted with specific information about how the public can attend and show support.
